sourcesContent:
Our Doctors
Here you can check all our doctors and their specialities
# Doctor Email Speciality
{{i+1}} {{doctor.name}} {{doctor.email}} {{doctor.speciality}}

{{doctors | json}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-doctors-page', templateUrl: './doctors-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./doctors-page.component.scss'] }) export class DoctorsPageComponent implements OnInit { doctors1 = [ { name:'Peter Parker', email:'p.parker@gmail.com', speciality:'Spiderman' }, { name:'Steven Strange', email:'steven.strange@marvel.com', speciality:'Surgeon' }, ]; data : any; doctors : any; constructor(private http: HttpClient ){ } async ngOnInit() { this.doctors = this.http.get('https://localhost:7288/api/Doctor'); this.data = await this.getDoctors(); } showDoctors(){ console.log(this.doctors); } async getDoctors(){ this.logData().then((value) => this.data = value); console.log(this.data); } logData(){ const docs = this.http.get('https://localhost:7288/api/Doctor').toPromise(); return docs.then(value => { return value ? true : false; }); } }
